extension.summary: Simple Nexus Wizard is a lightweight template for installing builds on Kodi 20 Nexus. Has some code from Aftermath Wizard by Surfacingx. Skin Switch by OpenELEQ. Base code by BYB. Credits to them and all others who contributed. Please report any bugs to @slamious on Telegram/Twitter.
extension.news: 1.2 - Updated account manager 2.4.6 account view 2.3.1 1.1 - Updated account manager 2.4.2 account view 2.2.8 1.0 - Initial Release

extension.summary: Simple Omega Wizard is a lightweight template for installing builds on Kodi 21 Omega. Has some code from Aftermath Wizard by Surfacingx. Skin Switch by OpenELEQ. Base code by BYB. Credits to them and all others who contributed. Please report any bugs to @slamious on Telegram/Twitter.
extension.news: 1.2 - Updated Website 1.1 - Added Omega 1.0 - Initial Release

1.1.4 - Added support for enabling Auto-Play. 1.1.3 - Added afFENity 1.1.2 - Added Fen Light 1.1.1 - Minor bug fixes and cleanup 1.1.0 - Cleaned up code. Changed addonid from script to plugin. Added TheLab, TheLabjr, Dradis, Taz19 1.0.9 - Fixed bug preventing Umbrella 3D from being disabled. 1.0.8 - Added support for DV and 3D settings. Added Patriot, Black Lightning and 9-Lives. 1.0.7 - Added Coalition and Absolution. Removed The Promise. 1.0.6 - Added chains genocide and Quicksilver. 1.0.5 - Initial Release.

extension.summary: Access your content from Furk, Easynews and Debrid Clouds.
extension.description: This add-on is intended for advanced Kodi users only. You must own the content of any media you play through this addon.
extension.disclaimer: The author of this addon does not host any of the content which is found and has no affiliation with any of the content providers.
extension.license: GNU GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE. Version 3, 29 June 2007
extension.news: INFO: For latest changes see Changelog within Tools of add-on.
